info.author: Tomer Filiba
info.description: A general-purpose cross-language RPC framework that aims to mask out all network-level details and lift programming to the level of *function calls*, rather than *bytes*.
info.name: layer5
info.html_description: A general-purpose cross-language RPC framework that aims to mask out all network-level details and lift programming to the level of function calls, rather than bytes.
